SMC_CamDisplayer_Dynamics (STRUCT)
SMC_CamDisplayer_Dynamics (STRUCT)
Â¶
TYPE SMC_CamDisplayer_Dynamics : STRUCT
Data structure containing the cam dynamics at a master position.
InOut:
Name
Type
Comment
x
LREAL
Master position
y
LREAL
Slave position
v
LREAL
Slave velocity wrt. the master position
a
LREAL
Slave acceleration wrt. the master position
j
LREAL
Slave jerk wrt. the master position

rows.Name: v
rows.Comment: Slave velocity wrt. the master position

rows.Name: a
rows.Comment: Slave acceleration wrt. the master position

rows.Name: j
rows.Comment: Slave jerk wrt. the master position
